00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TShapeB1.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"

00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {

00040 std::string TShapeB1::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeB1"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeB1::~TShapeB1() {}
00044 
00045 bool TShapeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00046                          double& result, 
00047                          MsqError& )
00048 {
00049   const double d = det(T);
00050   if (invalid_determinant(d)) { // barrier
00051     result = 0.0;
00052     return false;
00053   }
00054     
00055   result = 0.5 * sqr_Frobenius(T) / d - 1;
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool TShapeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00060                                    double& result,
00061                                    MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00062                                    MsqError& err )
00063 {
00064   const double d = det(T);
00065   if (invalid_determinant(d)) { // barrier
00066     result = 0.0;
00067     return false;
00068   }
00069   
00070   double inv_d = 1.0/d;
00071   result = 0.5 * sqr_Frobenius(T) * inv_d;
00072   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00073   deriv_wrt_T -= result * transpose_adj(T);
00074   deriv_wrt_T *= inv_d;
00075 
00076   result -= 1.0;
00077   return true;
00078 }
00079 
00088 bool TShapeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00089                                    double& result,
00090                                    MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00091                                    MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00092                                    MsqError& err )
00093 {
00094   const double d = det(T);
00095   if (invalid_determinant(d)) { // barrier
00096     result = 0.0;
00097     return false;
00098   }
00099     
00100   double inv_d = 1.0/d;
00101   double f1 = sqr_Frobenius(T) * inv_d;
00102   result = 0.5 * f1;
00103   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00104   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00105   deriv_wrt_T -= result * adjt;
00106   deriv_wrt_T *= inv_d;
00107   
00108   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, f1 * inv_d * inv_d, adjt );
00109   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -inv_d*inv_d, T, adjt );
00110   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, inv_d );
00111   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -result * inv_d );
00112 
00113   result -= 1.0;
00114   return true;
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 bool TShapeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00119                          double& result, 
00120                          MsqError& )
00121 {
00122   double f = Frobenius(T);
00123   double d = det(T);
00124   double den = 3 * MSQ_SQRT_THREE * d;
00125   if (invalid_determinant(d)) {
00126     result = 0.0;
00127     return false;
00128   }
00129   result = (f*f*f)/den - 1.0;
00130   return true;
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 bool TShapeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00135                                    double& result, 
00136                                    MsqMatrix<3,3>& wrt_T,
00137                                    MsqError&  )
00138 {
00139   double d = det(T);
00140   if (invalid_determinant(d)) {
00141     result = 0.0;
00142     return false;
00143   }
00144     
00145   double norm = Frobenius(T);
00146   double den = 1.0/(3 * MSQ_SQRT_THREE * d);
00147   double norm_cube = norm*norm*norm;
00148   result = norm_cube * den - 1.0;
00149   wrt_T = T;
00150   wrt_T *= 3 * norm * den;
00151   wrt_T -= norm_cube * den/d * transpose_adj(T);
00152    return true;
00153 }
00154 
00155 bool TShapeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00156                                    double& result,
00157                                    MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00158                                    MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00159                                    MsqError& err )
00160 {
00161   double d = det(T);
00162   if (invalid_determinant(d)) {
00163     result = 0.0;
00164     return false;
00165   }
00166   
00167   double id = 1.0/d;
00168   double norm = Frobenius(T);
00169   double den = 1.0/(3 * MSQ_SQRT_THREE * d);
00170   double norm_cube = norm*norm*norm;
00171   result = norm_cube * den - 1.0;
00172   MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00173   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00174   deriv_wrt_T *= 3 * norm * den;
00175   deriv_wrt_T -= norm_cube * den * id * transpose_adj(T);
00176  
00177   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 3 * den / norm, T );
00178   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 3 * norm * den );
00179   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -den * norm_cube * id, T );
00180   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 2 * den * norm_cube * id * id , adjt );
00181   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second_wrt_T, -3 * norm * den * id, T, adjt );
00182 
00183   return true;
00184 }
